```{r}
#import data

```
## part (a).

```{r}
# histogram
hist(Y[,1],breaks = round(sqrt(300)),prob = T)
# kernel smoother superimposition
density_estimate <- density(Y)
# Overlay the density curve on the histogram (adjust line color as needed)
lines(density_estimate$x, density_estimate$y, col="forestgreen", lwd=4)
```
